data.content:
Danh từ
sự hong gió, sự phơi (cho khô)
sự bộc lộ, sự thổ lộ, sự bày tỏ, sự phô bày
give one's views an airing
bày tỏ quan điểm của mình

noun
plural -ings
an occurrence in which something is aired: such as
[singular] :an occurrence in which something (such as an idea) is made known to many people so that it can be discussed
His ideas deserve an airing. [=his ideas deserve to be aired]
A full airing of the issue is scheduled.
[count] :an occurrence in which a radio or television program is broadcast
The series had its first airing [=the series was first aired/broadcast] on a local channel.
the airing [=broadcast] of a presidential debate
[count] :an occurrence in which fresh air is allowed to fill a place or to surround something
give the room an airing [=air the room] by opening the windows
